Description:
Refreshed for Easy Living
Only take one step inside and you will feel at ease with the detail, love and passion that has been poured into this beautiful family home. In the heart of this home is the gorgeous kitchen with the elegant stone bench tops and high-end appliances. The kitchen features an electric Fisher & Paykel cooktop and oven, along with a stainless-steel dishwasher. It is accompanied by exquisite matte black tap wear and sink along with an abundance of storage. The spacious dining and second lounge area accompanies new timber look vinyl and extra storage space for all that special glass wear. This stunning home also includes three good sized bedrooms, central family bathroom, ducted heating and cooling and two living areas. Set on a huge block of 702m2 (approx.) it is sure to impress.
In this superb location hidden away in a cosy court it is only a stone's throw away from parks, local football ovals and only a short drive to shopping centers. This quiet location has something for everyone.
From the front door you will be wowed by the fire place, brand-new carpet and timber look vinyl throughout. The three bedrooms are all at a good size, the master enjoys a walk-in robe and ensuite. The other two bedrooms include built in robes and new white shutters. The open living-dining area enjoys an abundance of storage and sliding doors which opens out to the amazing undercover patio. If you're an entertainer, this outside area is a perfect spot for a family barbeque or a wine or two. Beyond the patio is a huge backyard surrounded by roses and greenery, this is also accompanied by a garden shed perfect for any green thumb.
Extras include motorized shutters on two of the bedrooms, the ensuite, kitchen and main bathroom. There are also two toilets, a double car garage and loads of natural light. To enjoy all of the hard work that's been put into this extra special home, come along to one of the open for inspections!
Insights: 15 Lino Court, Whittington VIC 3219 was last sold in 2018 and 30 other 3 bedroom house in Whittington have recently been sold.

Description:
Immaculate First Home or Rewarding Investment
Recently undergoing a full renovation, this very attractive home offers matchless value for first home buyers, or a lucrative return for investors.
The property itself is positioned in a quiet court location that's in close proximity to major amenities such as the Newcomb Shopping Village, health services, the Gordon TAFE, numerous schools, public transport and is only minutes to the CBD.
Set on a generous allotment of approximately 630m2, the home comprises:
• 4 spacious bedrooms, all with BIRs
• Modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances & ample storage
• Expansive, separate living area with split system heating/cooling
• Oversized single car garage with ample storage space
• Substantial off-street parking
• Enormous front and rear yards, ideal for kids and/or pets
• Previously leased at $360/week
Call now for more information or to inspect.

Description:
Fantastic Family Home.
Nestled in the middle of a quiet pocket of Whittington this property is ideal for the first homebuyer wanting to make their mark on the property ladder, or investor wanting to compliment their property portfolio with a solid return.
This brick veneer maintenance free home comprises of three large bedrooms, the master with ensuite & built in robe, second bathroom with bath & overhead shower, open plan kitchen & meals, separate lounge, double lock up garage and more. Sitting on a large 684m2 (approx.) allotment boasting large maintenance free gardens with additional wide side access to the rear yard. Additional features include a large water tank, ceiling fans, gas hot water service & gas wall furnace providing warmth on a cold winters day, as well as roller shutters for privacy throughout.
Positioned 10mins from Geelong CBD & ideally located in close proximity to several primary & secondary schools, Newcomb Centro, with Aldi, Bellarine Village shopping centres & Splash Down Recreational Centre on Coppards Road.
This exceptional value in a high demand area is an opportunity not to be missed.

Description:
Class and Style!
Situated in a quite court location, this property offers a great blend of modern updates, renovations and easy maintenance living. Featuring a spacious living area, brand new kitchen, fitted with S/S appliances, dishwasher, dining area, two good sized bedrooms both with built in robes, central bathroom and separate toilet.
This unit showcases quality finishes throughout with large windows putting an emphasis on natural light plus the added comfort of heating and cooling. Externally the unit offers a great yard, easy maintenance gardens and a SLUG which could easily be used as a home office or second living. No body corporate and only a 5-minute walk to Splashdown as well as close proximity to the Newcomb Central Shopping Centre and the CBD.
Ideal for a first home buyer, downsizer or investor, this property is the complete package with quality inclusions and nothing further to do.

Description:
Outstanding Family Home At An Affordable Price!
This could well be the find of the year! Set on an impressive allotment of approximately 714 square metres this well presented home will appeal to any family searching for space to move without breaking the budget and features 3 large bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk-in robe, 2 zoned living areas, intelligently designed kitchen complete with a plethora of cupboard and storage space plus adjoining dining area and a massive second bathroom with corner bath and shower.
Notable extras include parquetry flooring in the dining and kitchen area, 2 gas heaters in the living rooms, built-in robes and wall-to-wall carpet in the 2 additional bedrooms, quadruple linen press in the hall and an as new hot water service.
For the outdoor enthusiast there's a 2 car garage with drive through access that leads to a spacious rear yard and additional workshop/shed out the back and a neat outdoor entertainment area off the dining room that's ready for further improvement or extension (STCA).
The estimated rental for any investor looking to purchase is a very attractive $340 per week and with schools, shops, Spashdown leisure centre, sports ovals and a bus stop nearby to take you to the CBD or down to the magnificent Bellarine this presents as a brilliant opportunity to "set and collect" with an eye to the future.

Description:
Your Search is Over!
Looking for a family home that has both house size and a backyard? Well your search is over with this delightful home. Comprising 4 bedrooms, all with built in robes and serviced by a central family bathroom. With open plan living featuring a functional kitchen which has been recently updated and dining/meals area along with a study and lounge which is heated by a cosy wood fire. Outdoors there is a great undercover entertaining area leading to the large backyard complete with in ground pool for those summer family occasions. Other features include: Gas ducted heating, split system cooling and heating, 5000Lt water tank storage to service the garden, single carport and additional garaging & shedding. All of this on an impressive 961m2 approx. allotment.
Situated within close proximity to all amenities including, public transport, Whittington Primary School, Newcomb Secondary College, Newcomb Central and Bellarine Village Shopping Centres, Splashdown Leisure Centre, local parks and sporting facilities. Don't miss your chance and enquire today!

Description:
Entertainer's Delight
This nicely presented family home sits on a 683sqm(approx) allotment which is fully fenced with remote control gate and easily maintained gardens. The home comprises 4 large bedrooms, all with built-in robes and ceiling fans. The master bedroom is situated upstairs away from the kids with newly refurbished ensuite, a separate toilet and split system for those warmer nights. On the ground floor you will walk through the front door to an open plan lounge, dining and kitchen area which includes split system, stainless steel appliances including Bosch dishwasher, electric oven, gas cook top and range hood. The kitchen has loads of cupboard and bench space for those that love to cook along with walk-in pantry. Down the hallway you will find the 3 remaining bedrooms and main bathroom which includes a corner spa with double vanity and the second toilet. Walk back through the kitchen to the second living area and out through the double doors that lead onto the gorgeous large alfresco entertaining area, with surround sound to play your favourite tunes or sit back and relax and entertain with family and friends. Out into the backyard there is also seating area around the fire pit for those nice autumn evenings. A 4 car lock-up garage with side access, also double carport. The house is freshly painted throughout, close to all amenities including Newcomb central, library and medical centre and only 5 minutes from the Geelong CBD and easy access to the Bellarine Peninsula . Get along to inspect this lovely family home as it will not last long in this market!
Insights: 21 Hickey Street, Whittington VIC 3219 was last sold in 2018 and 6 other 4 bedroom house in Whittington have recently been sold.

The property is very neat & spacious four bedroom home with three bedrooms (all with built-in robes) in the main part of the home and the 4th ideal as a teenagers' retreat or rumpus room with separate access. Description:
Room for all the Boys' Toys
This lovely 3 bedroom home which has undergone a total transformation and has the added bonus of an oversized double garage plus extra height carport suitable for caravan or boat.
Freshly painted throughout, open plan lounge & dining area, new flooring to bedrooms all with built-in robes, updated bathroom & functional kitchen with pantry & gas cooking. Covered outdoor entertainment area with sink.
The house has been positioned forward on the 581 sqm block giving you a secure backyard & storage for additional vehicles. The garage (5.8m x 7.4m) has been utilized as a teenage retreat & games room. There is also a store room/workshop located behind the carport (4m x 7m) that has enough height to fit a boat or caravan.
Within walking distance to Splashdown pool & Newcomb sports ground & easy reach of shopping centres & services. There is plenty on offer with this home, don't let the opportunity pass you by. Estimated rent $350 - $360pw

Description:
Is This Your Perfect Opportunity?
Whether you're wanting to make your homeowner dreams a reality or looking to start an investment portfolio, this is the property for you! Proximity to the shops, cafes, and supermarkets on the Bellarine Highway is a huge plus, while easy access to local primary schools and Newcomb Secondary College puts the foundations in place for easy living.
This neat and tidy home is low maintenance and consists of three bedrooms with built in robes, master with full ensuite and walk-in robe. The heat of the home is a spacious open plan kitchen/dining and living room with easy access out to the undercover entertaining area. The remaining 2 bedrooms are serviced by a modern central bathroom.
The home is on its own title with no body corporate or common areas.
Many extras include gas central heating, split system A/C and a double remote garage with internal access.
If you're looking for a comfortable lifestyle, your search is over.

Description:
Are you Ready?
Looking for a real fixer upper or pull down and start again - that offers supreme value. With 4 generous bedrooms, huge living space that flows from the lounge, dining and kitchen plus a second sunroom at the rear. Enjoying a huge living space although will need significant work to bring it back to its former glory or perhaps look to redevelop the site with a single residence or possibly a duplex (stca). Sitting a on a corner site of 387 sqm allotment totally separate and in one of Geelong's booming suburbs. With the Geelong city centre only minutes away, great schools including the Gordon (Australia's No.1 Large Training Organisation), loads of shops, transport and even reserves/park land are close by. Also offering easy access to the Bellerine Peninsula - its waiting, are you ready?
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Quiet Location and Very Solid Investment
Set in a quiet cul-de-sac,this neat 3 bedroom home will be perfect for a first home buyer or if you are looking for a low maintenance investment. Set on 533m2 the home has a lovely northerly aspect and ready for you to make use of the spacious private rear yard. Big enough for a family but small enough for one with main L-shaped lounge area with enough space for dining table or computer area and second area with kitchen and open plan meals area. The well positioned kitchen is spacious with breakfast bar, 2 pantries, gas freestanding cooker, large windows allowing loads of light and all overlooking the back yard. 5 minutes drive to shops, schools, sports facilities and only 10 minutes to the Geelong CBD. Other features include gas wall heater, split system, attached lock-up garage, garden shed with a rental estimate of $340-$360pw.

Description:
An Ideal Investment Or First Home
A fantastic start for the first home owner or a great investment to add to your portfolio this single level, low maintenance private brick home holds all the answers. Nestled behind a high timber fence and comprising three bedrooms, cozy lounge with gas heating and split system air conditioning, kitchen meals area and a large wrap around under cover pergola incorporating the carport.
The home location means you can easily commute into Geelong's CBD or head down the Bellarine Peninsula or Surf Coast. Call Today to book your inspection or please feel free to attend any upcoming opens. Vacant Possession is available.

Description:
Investment Opportunity
A wonderful opportunity exists right here to enter the property market or add to your portfolio with this neat, compact unit. Consisting of 2 bedrooms, both with built in robes, open plan kitchen, dining & living area and central bathroom. Outdoors you will find a private courtyard & backyard and secure single lock up garage. Other features include Gas wall heater and split system heating & cooling to the living area. Close proximity to all amenities including schools, medical & sporting facilities, public transport, Buckley's Entertainment Centre and only a short drive to both Newcomb shopping centres and the CBD. Currently leased for $265 per week until May 2018, this is a must inspection for the savvy investor.
Terms...10% Deposit, 30/60 day Settlement... For alternative arrangements, please discuss with agent.

Description:
LARGE FAMILY HOME IN GROWTH POCKET
This 2 storey 5bd, 3 bath, 4 car family home SCREAMS POTENTIAL.
Set on 735m2 block in a quiet court in growing Whittington, this property can be "move in now, renovate later" or rent out tomorrow.
Offering a large front living room with ceiling fans and built in heater.
A separate dining room positioned off the kitchen which seats up to 8.
The central kitchen has been updated less than 2 years ago and offers Smeg Dishwasher, 6 plate induction cooktop and fantastic dual oven.
There is also a handy informal meals area for all your family needs.
Down the hall you will find 3 good size bedrooms, all with BIR and 1 bedroom with ensuite offering shower and vanity.
There is also a 2nd bathroom with shower over bath and separate toilet.
Upstairs is the parents retreat offering a 2nd lounge room with ceiling fan and reverse cycle split system for all year round comfort. There are also an additional two bedrooms, 1 with BIR and great natural light and the spacious master bedroom with loads of storage, BIR and corner ensuite offering shower, toilet and heatlamps.
Outside you will find a double carport and DLUG ready to be reclaimed. It also has a great undercover pergola area perfect for summer BBQ's, and a rear grassed yard and dog run for all your family or pets needs.
FEATURES
735m2
Quiet court
Updated Kitchen
Rent pw $370
